latest_release.name: GitHub Action for building Azure Web Apps

definition.name: App Service Web App Build Action
definition.description: Build an Azure Web App on Linux using the Oryx build system.

inputs.name: source-directory
inputs.description:
'Relative path (within the repository) to the source directory of the project you want to build; if no value is
provided for this, the root of the repository ("GITHUB_WORKSPACE" environment variable) will be built.'

inputs.name: platform
inputs.description:
'Programming platform used to build the web app; if no value is provided, Oryx will determine the platform to
build with. Supported values: dotnet, golang, java, nodejs, php, python, ruby'

inputs.name: platform-version
inputs.description:
'Version of the programming platform used to build the web app; if no value is provided, Oryx will determine the
version needed to build the repository.'

inputs.name: output-directory
inputs.description: The directory where the build output will be copied to.

evidence.reasoning: This action is specifically designed to build an Azure Web App, which falls under the Build category, and it also involves deploying the built application to Azure, thus it is categorized under Deployment as well.
